summary: Tumblr is a popular website where people can create their own blogs and share different types of content like photos, videos, and text. It was started in 2007 by David Karp. Users can easily post short messages and media, making it a fun way to express yourself online. Many people use Tumblr to connect with others who like similar things, such as art, music, or books. The site is now owned by the company Automattic.
title: Tumblr
